contents:
我经常觉得之所以有这种历史的必然还是偶然的讨论，多半也是受了所谓“历史唯物主义”的影响，七绕八绕就绕到“某某事件是历史的必然”上面去了。

以下是wiki 对马克思历史唯物主义的介绍：

“The Marxist theory of historical materialism theorises that society is fundamentally determined by the material conditions at any given time – in other words, the relationships which people have with each other in order to fulfill basic needs such as feeding, clothing and housing themselves and their families. Overall, Marx and Engels claimed to have identified five successive stages of the development of these material conditions in Western Europe.”

简言之就是，各种基本物质需求是人与人关系的基础。

于此截然相反的是，人与人的关系是由各种观念(ideas)决定的。

且不论这是不是过分简化，哪里看出历史决定论的痕迹了，而且依据其观点：

The actual historical process is not predetermined but depends on the class struggle

历史并非预先决定的，但受到阶级斗争（突然感觉斗争也不准确，“斗争”对于“struggle”来说过于主动）的影响。
